title.feature2: Clearer Display of Available Times, <2 />Easier Selection
title.highlight: Automatically Adjust the Time <2 />According to Your Schedule, <5 />No More Worries!
title.card1: Without Repetition, Just One Registration Is All You Need
title.card2: Manage Your Time Easily and Quickly Offline with Just One QR Code

description.main: Share the link once to organize schedules <2 />with multiple people, and find the most suitable time.
description.feature1: You can easily see the time <2 />when the most people can participate <2 />in the event.
description.feature2: Is it difficult to estimate the available time? <2 />Then try deleting with 'Unavailable Time'.
description.card1: When you pre-register your schedule once, the unavailable time is automatically excluded.
description.card2: In offline, try adjusting the time with just one QR code instead of sharing the link.

alert.loginDescription: If you log in, your information is automatically entered, and you can save your schedule!

alert.deleteEventDescription: If you delete the event, all schedules added to it will be removed!
alert.backButtonTitle: Do you want to leave the page?

withdraw.mainTitle: Do you really want to delete your account?
withdraw.title1: Your account will be deleted immediately
withdraw.description1: The information of the deleted account cannot be recovered. After deletion, your account will be deleted immediately.
withdraw.title2: All your event and schedule data will be deleted
withdraw.description2: All content written in OneTime, such as the schedules registered for events, will be deleted.
withdraw.agreeText: Yes, I have confirmed the above.
